title: European advances in digital rheumatology: explainable insights and personalized digital health tools for psoriatic arthritis
details: LJ Hadjileontiadis, V Charisis, S Hadjidimitriou… - eClinicalMedicine, 2025
abstract: The shift from traditional to technology-based diagnosis and management of psoriatic arthritis (PsA) represents a significant evolution in patient care. Traditionally, PsA was diagnosed and managed through clinical evaluations, physical …
